name: Cornerstone Aviation
about: Cornerstone Aviation, founded in 2003, is Utah's premier flight school, operating at Salt Lake International Airport and Ogden-Hinckley Airport. As an FAA Approved Part 141 Flight School, CSA offers comprehensive training from zero experience to Commercial Pilot Certification in 189 hours. We focus on safety, proficiency, and professionalism, educating pilots rather than just training them. Our team includes experienced instructors, many from military and airline backgrounds, and a dedicated office staff. We provide personalized training plans, including non-traditional student programs, and utilize advanced training tools such as FAA-certified Redbird simulators and CommSim training. With a perfect safety record since its founding, Cornerstone Aviation is committed to helping students achieve their aviation goals in a supportive and professional environment. Join us to realize your dreams of becoming a pilot.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
